DOC.brief_title: Flunarizine Versus Topiramate Chronic Migraine Prophylaxis
DOC.detailed_description: Chronic migraine ( CM ) prevalent devastate disorder limit therapeutic option . This study explore efficacy 10 mg/day flunarizine CM prophylaxis compare 50 mg/day topiramate . We conduct prospective , randomize , open-label , blinded-endpoint ( PROBE ) trial . Patients CM randomize ( 1:1 ) flunarizine topiramate treatment group . This study consist two period : prospective baseline screen period last 2 week ( week -2 week 0 , T0 ) , treatment period last 8 week enrollment ( week 0-8 , T1-T4 ) . The treatment phase consist 2-week titration period ( T1 ) 6-week maintenance period ( T2-T4 ) . During titration period , subject give 25 mg/day topiramate 5 mg/day flunarizine daily first week , follow 50 mg/day topiramate 10 mg/day flunarizine divide dos ( twice daily ) second week . When subject could tolerate target dose , initial dose continue T4 . Patients follow per 2 week Headache Clinic . At visit , diary collect directed outcome evaluator , blind patient ' treatment . The primary outcome assess reduction total number headache day migraine day 8 week treatment ( week 7 8 vs. week -2 0 ) . Secondary outcome reduction number day acute abortive medication intake acute abortive medication tablet take , 50 % responder rate .
